example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <List>
      <ListItem icon={<Icons.Check color="success" />}>
        Download boarding passes
      </ListItem>
      <ListItem icon={<Icons.Check color="success" />}>
        Get exclusive deals
      </ListItem>
      <ListItem icon={<Icons.Check color="success" />}>
        Book in one click
      </ListItem>
    </List>
    <List>
      <ListItem
        icon={
          <CarrierLogo
            carriers={[
              {
                code: "FR",
                name: "Ryanair",
              },
            ]}
          />
        }
      >
        Airline: Ryanair
      </ListItem>
      <ListItem icon={<Icons.InformationCircle />}>Flight no: FR 1337</ListItem>
      <ListItem icon={<Icons.Airplane />}>Plane: Airbus A320</ListItem>
    </List>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Lists with icons
info.description: To make the lists more engaging, you can use other icons or carrier logos in place of the circles for the items.
